748850.name: LaGuardia [KLGA] airport for Tower!3D Pro
748850.description:
Tower!3D Pro - KLGA airport is an add-on airport for Tower!3D Pro giving you an additional airport for your controlling challenge. With it's two short runways this airport will give you a unique experience requiring some precise controlling skills.


LaGuardia Airport an international airport in the northern part of the New York city. In 2015, the airport handled 31.4 million passangers. La Guardia has four terminals connected by buses and walkways. The airport opened with four runways at 45-degree angles to each other, the longest (13/31) being 6,000 ft. Although La Guardia was a large airport for the era in which it was built, it soon became too small. Starting in 1968 general aviation aircraft were charged heavy fees to operate from La Guardia during peak hours, driving many GA operators to airports such as Teterboro Airport.

英语*
